Experiment Method.Assay Method: Allelic Expression Analysis and Epigenetic Profiling

Material used.Material Name: Lymphoblastoid cell line and patient blood cells
Material used.Description: Expression of SNCA alleles was analyzed in a lymphoblastoid cell line and blood cells of a patient heterozygous for p.Ala53Thr.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Epigenetic silencing of the mutated allele
Readout description.Result Description: The p.Ala53Thr allele was epigenetically silenced, leading to allelic imbalance and upregulation of the wild-type allele.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the abstract.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the abstract.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly described in the abstract.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the abstract.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal allelic expression (wild-type and mutant alleles equally expressed).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant allelic imbalance (>50% difference in expression between wild-type and mutant alleles).
